title: The Rainbow Fish
short_plot_summary: The Rainbow Fish learns the value of sharing and friendship when he gives away his beautiful shimmering scales to other fish.
explanation: A rainbow, symbolizing the beautiful and colorful scales of the Rainbow Fish
A fish, representing the main character, the Rainbow Fish
A sparkle, indicating the shiny, shimmery scales of the Rainbow Fish
Raised hands, symbolizing the act of giving and sharing
A tropical fish, representing the other fish in the ocean that the Rainbow Fish shares his scales with
